attributes.action: Make Dartmoor legal to wild camp on again
attributes.additional_details: we want the government or parliament to do it because we are powerless against the decision and only the government / parliament can change it. Please help us get our freedom back
attributes.background: we would like to the government to make Dartmoor legal to wild camp on again after it was taken from us by a rich landowner that doesn’t understand what Dartmoor means to people and the Duke of Edinburgh and Ten Tors and for peoples mental health. Getting outdoors is vital for people.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. Decisions about legal cases referred to the courts are a matter for judiciary, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Enshrine in law rights to roam and wild camp in national parks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631241
